name: Arjun Yadav
warning_signs: Decreased urine output or dark-colored urine
follow_up_instructions: Attend dialysis sessions as scheduled (3 times per week)
Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
discharge_summary:
Patient Arjun Yadav was admitted on 2025-09-26 with Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 4. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Aspirin 81mg daily, Metformin 500mg twice daily, Amlodipine 5mg daily. 
Procedures performed included Arteriovenous fistula creation, Ultrasound-guided kidney drainage, Blood transfusion.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
